-- https://wowpedia.fandom.com/wiki/API_GetThreatStatusColor if (not GetThreatStatusColor) then GetThreatStatusColor = function(status) if (not status) or (status == 0) then return 0.69, 0.69, 0.69 elseif (status == 1) then return 1.00, 1.00, 0.47 elseif (status == 2) then return 1.00, 0.60, 0.00 elseif (status == 3) then return 1.00, 0.00, 0.00 end end end
if (WOW_PROJECT_ID == WOW_PROJECT_MAINLINE) then
local Version = 5 if (tonumber(QOSBBI_SPAWN_PATCH_VERSION) or 0) < Version then QOSBBI_SPAWN_PATCH_VERSION = Version
local frame = _G.QOSBBI_EventFrame or CreateFrame("Frame", "QOSBBI_EventFrame") frame:UnregisterAllEvents() frame:SetScript("OnEvent", nil)
local globalName = "QuestObjectiveSetupBlockButton_Item" local global = function(...) if (QOSBBI_SPAWN_PATCH_VERSION ~= Version) then return end -- Only postpone spawns, not edits of existing buttons? local block, questLogIndex, isQuestComplete = ... if (InCombatLockdown()) and (not block.itemButton) then frame:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_REGEN_ENABLED") frame:SetScript("OnEvent", function() frame:UnregisterAllEvents() frame:SetScript("OnEvent", nil) ObjectiveTracker_Update(OBJECTIVE_TRACKER_UPDATE_ALL) end) return end return frame.global(...) end
if (IsAddOnLoaded("Blizzard_ObjectiveTracker")) then frame.global = frame.global or _G[globalName] _G[globalName] = global else frame:RegisterEvent("ADDON_LOADED") frame:SetScript("OnEvent", function(_, _, addon) if (addon == "Blizzard_ObjectiveTracker") then frame:UnregisterAllEvents() frame:SetScript("OnEvent", nil) frame.global = frame.global or _G[globalName] _G[globalName] = global end end) end end
end
